name: Snorri FR5
flavor_text: The latest and greatest in fusion.

frame.name: Precision Frame
frame.description: This weapon's recoil pattern is more predictably vertical.

perks.description:
Lightly vented barrel.
  •  Greatly controls recoil
  •  Increases handling speed
perks.name: Arrowhead Brake

perks.description:
Stable barrel attachment.
  •  Increases stability
  •  Moderately controls recoil
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
perks.name: Chambered Compensator

perks.description:
Balanced barrel. 
  •  Slightly increases range and stability
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
perks.name: Corkscrew Rifling

perks.description:
Weighty barrel extension.
  •  Increases range
  •  Decreases handling speed
  •  Moderately controls recoil
perks.name: Extended Barrel

perks.description:
Ultra-light barrel. 
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases stability
perks.name: Fluted Barrel

perks.description:
Barrel optimized for distance.
  •  Greatly increases range
  •  Decreases stability
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
perks.name: Full Bore

perks.description:
Durable ranged barrel.
  •  Increases range
perks.name: Hammer-Forged Rifling

perks.description:
Barrel optimized for recoil reduction.
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Polygonal Rifling

perks.description:
Dual strength barrel.
  •  Increases range
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Smallbore

perks.description:
Speeds up charge.
  •  Faster charge time
  •  Decreases impact damage
perks.name: Accelerated Coils

perks.description:
Strong battery life.
  •  Increases magazine size
perks.name: Enhanced Battery

perks.description:
Large heavy battery.
  •  Greatly increases magazine size
  •  Greatly decreases reload speed
perks.name: Ionized Battery

perks.description:
Slower-building charge for higher damage.
  •  Increases impact damage
  •  Slower charge time
perks.name: Liquid Coils

perks.description:
Constrains recoil for every bolt.
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Particle Repeater

perks.description:
Distance optimizations.
  •  Increases range
perks.name: Projection Fuse

perks.description: Increased accuracy, stability, and handling when firing while crouched.
perks.name: Firmly Planted

perks.description: Hitting three separate targets increases weapon handling, stability, reload, and range for a moderate duration.
perks.name: Stats for All

perks.description: Increases handling, reload speed, and stability for each fully charged ability.
perks.name: Surplus

perks.description: Grants increased reload speed when close to full magazine.
perks.name: Compulsive Reloader

perks.description: Final blows with this weapon increase accuracy and stability while improving vertical recoil.
perks.name: Heating Up

perks.description: Kills provide improved handling for all weapons for a short duration.
perks.name: Steady Hands

perks.description: Being in combat for an extended time increases damage, handling, and reload for this weapon until you are out of combat.
perks.name: Frenzy

perks.description: Each final blow increases charge/draw speed.
perks.name: Successful Warm-Up

perks.description: Kills with this weapon generate ability energy. This energy is divided between your uncharged abilities.
perks.name: Wellspring

perks.description: Rounds at the end of the magazine deal more damage.
perks.name: High-Impact Reserves

perks.description: When the battery is full, your next burst deals additional damage and causes enemies to explode on death.
perks.name: Reservoir Burst

perks.description: Hitting three separate targets increases damage for a moderate duration.
perks.name: One for All
